name: Uran
description:
Uran and the Asteroid a short platformer about bashing through walls

Dive into the cavernous asteroid and destroy it from the inside! Bash your way through walls, avoid enemy traps, and save your planet! It takes several tries to find the right path, press "R" at any time to start from the beginning.

Credits: ~ Music, SFX, Level Design ~

jneen (jneen.itch.io)

~ Art ~

Kieran Harris (kierano.itch.io, twitter.com/souldroids)

~ Programming ~

pixelbrain (pixelbrain.itch.io)
